case.state: Hello there! How are you? Are you ready to play?
Hey! Hello! How are you feeling? Prepared to play?
Oh, hello! Thanks for having me! I hope you're prepared to play!
Is this everyone? I think there's room for a couple more people.
Are we just going to have three in? I think that could be fun.
A small group wouldn't be so bad, but a big group might be more comfortable.
The more the merrier, of course!
So is this the whole group or are we waiting for one more person?
Is this everyone now? Just the four of us?
Oh, this is good! I think I'll feel a lot more comfortable in a big group!
It looks like everyone is here now! Shouldn't we get going?
It should be a lot of fun with lots of people! Does this mean we're ready to start now?
This isn't the sort of thing I usually do, but it should be pretty exciting.
I'm Roll, if you didn't know. I'm sure we're about to get to know each other very well.
Okay, let's get going! I know I'm ready to go!
I guess I'll exchange these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Can I get ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~? That would be great!
I'm going to do ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time, if that's okay.
I hope everything works out this time. I've got a good feeling about this.
Looks like it's smooth sailing for me!
This is a lot of fun! It's a little weird, but I think I was craving a little excitement.
~Player~? Are you doing okay? You're not getting distracted, are you?
Okay, I'm all set! Get ready to read 'em and weep!
Card games aren't that hard for me. Just like engineering and cooking, it's all about putting the right pieces together.
How is it going, ~player~? Did you get the hand you wanted?
Even when it looks like the coast is clear, it's best to be careful.
If I can fly the Flutter through pirate attacks while making sure Mega Man doesn't fall off the deck, I can certainly stay focused on this game no matter what happens!
I think I've lost enough for now. Somebody else should get to have a turn!
Alright, no more mistakes! Now I've got this whole thing figured out!
Nope, not this time! I'm fully prepared for whatever you have!
Be careful, ~player~. You never know what's going to happen in this kind of game.
I could still win this completely by accident, but I'd need someone else to have the accident.
Sometimes you just have to dive in and hope for the best!
I guess I should be safe this time. What about you, ~player~? Do you think you can make out okay?
I'm glad we're not playing for zenny. Money is tight enough as it is.
I think I'd rather see everyone naked than be naked. That's normal, right?
Gosh, I haven't had this much excitement in a long time. Not without risking my or Mega Man's life, at least.
Alright, ~player~. Let's just do our best!
Maybe I should try being more careful with my cards...
Uh-oh. I think I might have messed up.
Oh! I better watch out!
I've got a bad feeling about this round...
Hey! What's the big idea with these cards?
Sorry, I wasn't able to make anything good with the cards I was given.
So to~background.time~ might not be my ~background.time~.
Wait a minute! How did I mess that up? What happened?
I hope you did well, ~player~. That would at least make one of us.
I pushed my luck a bit too far on that one. I figured it would be worth the risk at this point.
Losing wouldn't be so bad, right? Hm, maybe I shouldn't give up yet.
Uh-oh. I... uh, think I messed up again.
W-what? Are you making fun of me?!
It's so hard to pick! I really like apricots myself, especially baked into a pie. I bake them all the time to share with gramps and Mega Man.
I don't think there's anything wrong with your name! I don't mind saying it at all!
The only instruments I'm good with are the instruments on my spotter panel. I'm not really musically inclined, unfortunately.

I haven't really given that sort of thing too much thought, Kumatora. If there's something Mega Man or I can't do, I usually build something to help us get it done. I'm not sure what I would need a superpower for.

A superpower? Gosh, I don't know. Maybe something to help keep Mega Man safe? Like I could sense danger for him? My spotting equipment sort of already does that though, so maybe that power would be wasted on me.
By any chance, has anyone seen a little monkey running around? I can't say for sure, but it's possible our robot Data followed me here. He has a weird habit of showing up wherever we go.

This is probably going to sound crazy, but could you guys let me know if you see a monkey? It's possible that it's Data, our... uh, pet, I guess? Sometimes we go somewhere and he's already there, so I'm worried he followed me here somehow.
I think the Flutter is bigger than you're imagining it. We all have our own rooms, plus a kitchen, two bathrooms, and a living room! There's also the engine room and my R&D workshop.
Are you using my name as a pun to brag about killing people?
Well, what can I say? I've loved working on machines ever since I was little! It's a good thing too because our ship needs a lot of attention.
Sometimes it's a lot of work, but I do enjoy working on the ship and building new weapons. It's all stuff that has to get done anyway, so I'm just lucky I find it so fun!
It depends on what I can get my hands on. Most days I'm just doing repairs and maintenance on the ship, but sometimes Mega Man will bring me some scrap to build him some armor or weapons.

I don't really have the time or resources to work on extra projects. Maintaining the Flutter eats up most of our cash. The only other thing I do regularly is make weapons and armor for Mega Man from the scrap he digs up.

B-b-b-boyfriend?! N-no! No? Of course not! H-he's like my brother! I mean, I love him, but it's totally platonic! There's been some sexually charged moments between us, b-b-b-but we haven't even kissed! Not that I want that! But I don't not want it?
For me, it's gotta be the Blade Arm attachment I made for Mega Man's armor! It generates a concentrated beam of plasma that can cut through steel like it was tissue paper!
Well, I could do something like that, but I'm pretty sure you wouldn't want me to.
Ah... well... um... that sort of stuff is expensive, but I've always got plenty of scrap parts and material around...
Not to brag, but I'm pretty handy in the kitchen too. Cooking, baking, you name it!
Well, that's his name. It's the one I gave to him, actually.
Mega Man is the one who goes into the ruins during our dig outs. He assumes a lot of the risk, puts himself in harms way. He does lots for us and me personally.
Unfortunately, I don't. I did spend a lot of time with Tron while we were building our rocket to rescue Mega Man, but there's just no getting along with her. She's nothing but a huge pain butt!
I guess I am a little nervous. It's just, you're so beautiful, Maria. Next to you, I-I'm not so sure anyone would care about me.
Winning would be nice, but it wouldn't be the worst thing in the world to lose, right? It might even be fun.
Oh, I was worried people might think these clothes are weird.
Yes, I am. Sorry, that must seem pretty boring to someone who can do magic...
Yes, yes, I'm aware my name is also a word. Every time I think I've heard them all, someone comes up with something new and embarrassing...
Title? No, that's just his name. Mega Man Volnutt.
Sometimes we find treasure, but anything that isn't actually useful never turns out to be very valuable. Mostly we're just after refractors.
I'm sure you know the answer to that, Kaz. I wouldn't feel too bad about it; I don't exactly dislike you.
I'm not so sure I could do that. I'm perfectly happy with my work now. Being in front of a camera sounds like it would be a little scary.
Do you know who left them behind? A lot of the records we find left behind are pretty cryptic. It was a long time before we really understood anything about who made the ruins.
That's kind of a long story, but the gist of it is he had to go. If he hadn't gone, it might've been the end of life on the planet.
The underlying principles of low orbit flight are not so complex that travel to the moon is unfeasible, but when someone refuses to listen to good sense and just messes up everything...
I thought I was going to be a nervous wreck, but I'm having a lot more fun that I thought I would!
I'm not so sure. I can't stop think about losing and how good it would feel to touch myself...
Rock? Rock who? Did you mean Mega Man?
Not literally "any two things." That should probably be obvious, but... well, I guess not to someone like you.
What's a "robot master?"
Look, I'm sure I didn't make it easy for her to get along with me, but she's so stubborn and stuck-up I don't know who could get along with her.
Is that a come on or are you just hungry?
Yeah! Absolutely! Did you have a mechanical question?
It sounds like you have a mechanical question for me, Dwight.
So you worked as a mechanic too, huh? I've always worked with machines. Runs in my family! At least, the last few generations.
It's always nice to meet a fellow mechanic, even a former one. I've been working with machines my whole life! It's kind of a family tradition!
Really? I can sorta imagine you in a denim jumpsuit and all covered in oil. Oil is the universal uniform of all mechanics.
That's pretty standard for a lot of mechanics, I think. It is pretty easy to imagine you in your little jumpsuit with a wrench in hand.
Me? Again? Oh no! How did I let this happen?
Stripping is embarrassing enough on it's own, so why did I have to go and lose like that a second time?
There's not much I can do if the rest of you are going to be so lucky each time...
How? Again? You would tell me if I was doing something wrong, right?
Apparently I'm the one who needs a spotter in here...
Gosh! You guys are really good at this game!
It doesn't seem fair for me to lose so many times in a row. I'm not sure how I could have prevented it!
That's too bad, but I had to get started sometime.
Well, that's okay. It's not like I'm in any danger of losing right now.
Oh, I'm not worried. I've been in bigger jams before!
Oh, I knew I shouldn't have gotten too overconfident. It's not over until it's over.
And I was so close too! I was just thinking I might not have to take anything else off.
Ha ha, well, it would be a lot more embarrassing if I was the only one that was naked.
Oh well, no reason to get bent out of shape. I just gotta keep up!
Don't count me out yet! I can pull through in a jam if I need to!
If I can land the Flutter when she's only got one engine working, I could still win this even without my pants.
Uh-oh. I'm starting to think I'm going to be one of the big losers here...
That's not good. I was hoping I had at least one more round before I had to take this off...
Oh, this is so embarrassing. At least I won't be the only one...
Darn, I was hoping to hold out just a little longer before I lost.
Am I missing something? I feel like I should be doing a lot better...
Oh, well, that's okay! I can't let it get me down! Maybe my luck will turn around!
I promise I'm not trying to lose on purpose. I just can't seem to string enough wins together.
Oh, it's embarrassing enough to be playing so poorly. This isn't going to help either.
Oh no! Really? I was hoping to avoid being the first one completely out of clothes if possible...
I do get that sometimes. It's kind of an old-fashioned notion, but I'm a little old-fashioned myself. I don't know, what do you think about it?
Yup! My grandpa found him and adopted him, but he let me name him. Maybe it is a little strange, but I was just a kid when I picked it out for him.
Well, it's his job to clean the toilet. He's pretty good about getting that done.
I asked her quite a few times, but she would always get all cagey and not give a straight answer. She's helped Mega Man before even though we're enemies, so there has to be some reason.
G-gosh, it's kinda weird to hear you say that. I always thought people just saw me as a greasy mechanic...
It has been, and I think I'm the one most surprised by that. I thought I might be too nervous to go through with it, but now that I made it this far...
Wait, are you saying you like it? You like my work clothes?
Whoa? Really? I thought magic was supposed to just solve all your problems with the snap of your fingers!
Right, my name is a food too. I've heard that one before, but I don't hold it against bread rolls. Personally, I like bread rolls.
Oh, is that why you're asking about the Flutter? Trying to invite yourself over? I don't know how I'd explain you to Gramps or Mega Man.
Usually nobody bats an eye, but for some reason people around here have trouble accepting it. Not sure why that is.
They're energy resources. Everything and anything that needs power runs off of refractor shards. We pretty much never have cash, but we can buy things with just refractor shards just as reliably.
I'm sure you think that, but it's not like Mega Man hasn't seen me naked. Even if those were accidents...
Gosh... you certainly have an active imagination...
I bet that's pretty handy. The ruins we go into have pretty much no information like that. Just an army for reaverbots defending them.
Thanks, and I'm sorry if it's difficult to talk about. Even now when I think about Mega Man traveling up to the moon without me, I do feel a little sad.

Building and funding the rocket all by myself wasn't going to be possible. I needed help, but the help I got was... not my first choice. We wasted a lot of time and resources because we couldn't stop arguing.
When I first met you, you seemed so cool and in control. I couldn't have possibly imagined something like this might make you nervous...
But it's not taboo here. It's expected. Accepted. Celebrated. It's okay to relax and let go, if only just for now.
As usual, I don't know what you're talking about, Bobobo. I don't know anyone named Rock.
I... wouldn't even know where to begin with doing any of that? Some of those things aren't even tangible? I think? Like, what do you mean "the great taste of bran?"
Are you just making up words?
The only impossibility was us seeing eye to eye, but we managed to do that long enough to succeed. Despite everything, I am grateful for her help...
Uh... Bobobo...
Their purpose is to protect against reaverbots, aggressive machines. I mean, we do have to fight off pirates every so often, but even then all we do is disable their vehicle...
I feel that way sometimes too. I even feel bad about destroying the reaverbots who attack us sometimes. The way they move around sometimes you'd swear they're alive.

Some of the reaverbots we've seen act and move around as if they were living things, so I get it. Even though they're dangerous and attack us, I still feel a little sad about destroying them sometimes.
I like to think I'm a pretty good mechanic, but nothing holds up forever. Especially stuff that's constantly getting shot at or blown up.
Machines aren't so different from people, after all. Without constant care, even we would fall to pieces. Even a good mechanic can only do so much sometimes.
You'd have to be careful you don't take off anything important. It is a weapon, after all.
Of course it would, but there's the small prerequisite of having to get rid of your existing limbs.
What are you imagining? It was just a little plastic casing that I put a small motor inside of so it would vibrate....
A generator? I've worked on that kind of thing before! Seen all shapes and kinds, really! There were even a few that powered security doors!
Oh, yeah, I've seen that sort of thing before! Worked on my fair share as well! Even a few that powered security doors.
I don't get out of the Flutter, our ship, all that much. It's my house and my workshop as well as how Gramps, Mega Man, and me all get around. I usually don't have much reason to leave.
Normally I stay at home on our airship, the Flutter, with Gramps and Mega Man. I don't have a ton of opportunities to meet new people, so this is a nice change of pace.

It's nice to meet some new people like this. I live on an airship, the Flutter, with Gramps and Mega Man. I love them both, and the Flutter has everything I need, but even I get tired of the same routine after a while.
I don't really have a lot of romantic or sexual experience, to be honest. Not a lot of chances for that sort of thing when you're constantly on the move.
It will be fun getting to know you all here, but I'm hoping I get to know myself a little better too. When you're stuck on an airship most days, you don't get a lot of romantic or sexual experience.
There's pretty much no opportunity for me to do anything like this back home. Barely a chance for any sort of romantic or sexual experience. Not a lot of privacy either...
I wasn't even sure I'd have to courage to show my breasts, but now that I have I feel... lighter? Unburdened?
Actually, I'm not as nervous as I was before. I feel sort of relaxed, even. Relieved, maybe?
Since I got this far, going just a little further doesn't seem so hard. It feels right, maybe.
I hope I'm not covered in grease. I think I'd die of embarrassment if have to unzip later and my chest had a huge grease smear on it...
I better not be covered in grease. If I take my hat off later and there's a big grease streak across my forehead, just don't tell me. I'll just see it later and die of embarrassment then...
I'm pretty sure I'm not covered in grease right now, but then again the more sure I am of that the more likely it is. It better not be on my butt or something...
I just wore my normal clothes when I came here, but was that the right choice? I don't really have that many clothes anyway.
My clothes aren't weird, are they? Honestly, I don't have the money to spend on a lot of clothes in the first place.
I hope it's okay that I'm just wearing my usual clothes. I don't really have any nice clothes or special underwear to begin with.
Gosh, I feel so self-conscious right now. I feel like my heart is going to beat right out of my chest.
This is so embarrassing, but it's also so exciting. I wasn't even sure I'd have the courage to make it this far.
Alright, then. Here it goes. Are you guys as nervous as I am about all this?
Well... it's possible that the motor could possibly maybe burn out...
I-it's not that tight. I fill it out a bit better than I did when I first got it years ago, but it's not uncomfortable or anything.
Huh? I-ignore them? Do you really think it's that bad? Gosh!
He's not a dog! He's a very important person to me! Please don't say anything mean about him...
He's good about doing any chore I ask him to do. I rely on him just as much as he relies on me.
What? No! That's ridiculous! Tron and Mega Man? No way! She better keep her grimy little pirate mitts off my ma--- off Mega Man!
Oh, w-well, it's not like I don't fantasize about... stuff like that sometimes...
That's an understatement. I don't think I've ever wanted to masturbate so bad...
Is... is that a yes? Oh, well... thanks! I'm glad you like whatever it is you like about it.
Gosh, I never thought I'd hear that today! Well, maybe I have soldered together a miracle or two in my career.
No, bad Bobobo. No more name puns for you.
Nice try, but you're not about to find out!
But that's clearly different! I don't know why anybody would ever call anyone "Caprese Boy." Do... do people actually call you that?
Well, I don't think they'd be quite so valuable if they were just laying around where anyone could grab them.
Pfft, you perv. You're a lot more forward than Mega Man. I don't... think I dislike that either...
And what about what you want? I think you should just come right out and say it, that is, if you want to make me horny...
Knowing what we know now, I can say that is exactly the case. It's not like we know everything now, but we'll keep digging and discovering more for sure!
How could both be true? Did he turn into a zombie? If my experience with traveling to the moon is anything to go off of, it's more likely that he got blown up. Maybe even more than once.

Yeah, eventually. We got really close when we first started out, but then a bunch of stuff went wrong and the attempt fizzled out. After years of zero progress, it really felt like we were never going to reach him.
I didn't know I had it in me either. Now I'm just nervous about what that might say about me...
And you've got time. I know I'm in no place to judge right now. Gosh, maybe I won't even look at my cards next round...
If I did know someone named Rock, I guess we could hang out together and be "Rock and Roll."
Yeah, I'm not sure even you know what you're talking about.
Is it possible you've got me confused with someone else?
Seriously?! I think your brain needs some concussive maintenance.
Just when I was starting to feel less embarrassed about losing...
Don't worry, ~player~. I'm sure she's only joking.Still, it might be best to keep any heavy weaponry away from her.
Expert precision? Uhm, the beam saber really isn't calibrated for that sort of thing!
If you want to be stronger or faster, there are plenty of other solutions that let you keep your body as it is.
I need some excitement every once and a while. Excitement that doesn't involve almost getting killed by reaverbots...

But I hope nothing bad happens to the Flutter while I'm gone. Gramps is a good mechanic, but he's not as spry as he used to be. Mega Man on the other hand... well, he's better at breaking than fixing things...
And who knows? Maybe there are some spare parts around here somewhere. Just think what I could build! It would also give me a less embarrassing excuse for where I went off to.
Once I thought I'd end up with Mega Man, but then he was stuck on the moon for all those years. That kind of distance puts a damper on a relationship that never really blossomed...
I mean, I guess there is Mega Man, but even though we're close it's... complicated. He was trapped on the moon for a really long time, so I'm just not sure where we really stand...

There is Mega Man, but the closest we've come to doing anything is when he walks in on me changing or bathing. Then he was trapped on the moon for a number of years, so I had a lot of time to consider other options...
I try and keep covered up so I don't get stains all over me, but it gets hot in the engine compartment. I unzip a little, I get sweating, I wipe my hands on myself. It just happens!

And I'm sure I don't have grease on my hands because these gloves do a great job of distributing it evenly across every surface I touch, including me. I can't work with greasy hands, so the gloves stay on.
I promise it's fresh grease, really! I bathe regularly, but stuff like motor oil and contact grease don't wash off easy. I have to use special soap so I don't always smell like an engine!

I'm only wondering because I found a dirty magazine under Mega Man's bed one time. All the women in there had really sexy lingerie and make-up on. Meanwhile, I'm just standing here in my work clothes...
I found a dirty magazine in Mega Man's room once, and all the women in it were dressed so provocatively. I just keep thinking I'd be more exciting to~background.time~ if I was dressed more like that.

I mean, Mega Man had a dirty magazine and all the women in there were wearing the most brazen outfits. I don't even know where I'd buy something like them, let alone if I've got the courage to wear it.
I'm not a lot to look at, so I hope you don't mind...
Hoo, okay, maybe I'll calm down if I just pretend I'm at home... in my room... and then Mega Man barges in...
Okay... I'm super embarrassed. Let's keep going before I say something dumb...
I'm even sort of happy losing one more time means I have to masturbate because all this excitement is making me horny...
I wasn't entirely sure about all of this in the beginning, but now I'm all worked up. Horny enough to touch myself, if you can beat me...
I can feel it. My heart's not pounding because I'm scared, but because I'm aroused...
Sorry, ~target~, but I had to beat you. You understand.
You'll just have to do better next time, ~target~. For now, maybe you can treat us to something nice.
Looks like you're having a little trouble, ~target~. Maybe you need somebody to spot for you.
It's not wrong to be happy about ~target~ losing, right?
Okay, ~target~. It's your turn!
Gosh, this round turned out better than I hoped.
This seems perfectly fair to me.
Hm, maybe some dreams do come true...
I hope we get more than just a peek at him.
The less imagination I have to use, the better!
I wouldn't mind ~target~'s company down at my level...
We're way past being coy. Give us a little show, ~target~.
Okay, that's more like it!
Too bad! I'm not giving up that easily!
Don't feel too bad, ~target~. I just think it'll be more fun if we share the bad luck around.
A guy like you wouldn't chicken out now, would he?
I could do with a bit more of ~target~...
Let's see a bit more than just that handsome face, okay?
~Target~, are you ready? Seems like it's your turn this time.
Sorry I can't watch your back here, ~target~. I've got my own hands full personally.
Don't worry, ~target~. You're in good company here. We're cheering for you!
Of course I want to see a bit more of ~target~. Well, maybe a lot more. You can't blame me for being curious.
Watch out, ~target~. Looks like you might have a little trouble headed your way.
I'm relieved to see it's ~target~ this time, but not just because that means it's not my turn. Really!
If you could, please consider that I'd really like to see something exciting from you, ~target~. Doesn't that seem fair?
It was a good day to disembark from the Flutter!
Wow, I was staring at ~target~ that whole time. Did I make that happen?
You've seen this much of me, I'd like to see just as much of you...
The further along we get in this game, the more exciting it gets. I didn't feel half this thrilled when we first started out.
Don't forget to lose with a little enthusiasm! Seeing you're having a good time is kind of a turn on...
Don't worry, ~target~. You're not out of this quite yet!
It's really too bad, ~target~. We do all really want to see you keep going though.
It's only fair, ~target~. I can't have all the bad luck, now can I?
I'm not so easy to beat. Besides, as a digger I've got a sense for when there's treasure to be found.
Gosh, I'm getting pretty excited about seeing a girl strip, but it's ~target~. Anyone would want to get a better view of that body, right?
I know you're more than just a pretty face, ~target~. Let's see what else you've got going for you!
Wait, what? Then what was even the point of that round?
It's a bit disappointing to go on a long dig and only come up with a few small refractors...
We've never found ~clothing~ while on a dig. Not even down a hole in the wall.
~clothing.ifPlural(Some|A)~ ~clothing~? That's kind of interesting. Do you think it would fetch a good price at the junk shop?

It's not the sort of thing we might come across on a dig. You wouldn't believe all the things people have thrown away over the centuries, but I guess they kept ~clothing.ifPlural(all their|every last)~ ~clothing~. Though, maybe they didn't have any.
So ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ your ~clothing~ valuable or something?
You've got quite the valuable little collection there, don't you?
Oh, is that all? You're kind of letting me down, ~target~.
It's find to take your time and all, but I know I'm past the point of getting excited over something like that.
Just his ~clothing~? Oh, no big deal then.
Right, stop everything. This ought to be a game changer...
Oh, not that I think you should sell your ~clothing~. Not unless you need money for spare parts to repair your often failing airship...
Ah, I didn't mean to imply your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ worthless or anything! I've sold my own clothes to get by once or twice, so I know even stuff like that has a price!
Even little things have some value though and a junk shop will buy just about anything! Even a hand vacuum or a box of active proximity mines.
Maybe just hold on to your ~clothing~, ~target~. Wait to sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ until you're in a real financial emergency.
You didn't bring a bunch of little things just to pad out your losses, did you?
Come on, ~target~. Now's the time to be impressing me...
I just want you to be honest with yourself and go a little faster. I mean, I'm already like this...
If you don't pick up the pace, we might just leave you behind, ~target~.
Please, don't be shy. I want to see as much of you as you've seen of me.
I wonder if Mega Man would buy me something like your ~clothing~. What would it even mean for a guy to do that?
Is there some story behind your ~clothing~? Did someone buy it for you?
I don't think your ~clothing~ is my style, exactly. Suits you just fine though.
I don't really wear a lot of jewelry of accessories. I wouldn't want to wear something that might get caught in the Flutter's machinery while I'm working on her.
Maybe if I had a lot of extraneous stuff, I wouldn't be in this jam.
You're not afraid of losing are you, ~target~? Seems like you might be stalling a bit.
I think you're doing well enough that you could risk taking some bigger strides right about now.
It's not a competition to see who has the most stuff, ~target~.
Oh no! Y-your head! H-hold on! I'll go get my rivet gun!
Sometimes Mega Man just finds little trinkets when he's out and about. He says they remind him of me and lets me keep them. I'm nearly out of space in my room due to his generosity.
Well, Mega Man does have a habit of giving me things he picks up, but it's not uncommon for him to go through trash cans. I just make sure to wash whatever he gives me first...
It's not like I have the money to spend on anything extra for myself. If I have spare zenny, it goes right into the Rainy Day Fund!

Tell me, ~target~, do nice little things like that make you happy? The stuff alone doesn't interest me, but if I get it as a gift from someone I care about it becomes important to me. Is it like that for you too?
Come one now ! Let's really get into the spirit of it!
I've got a feeling this might not work out like you're hoping it will...
If my selfish request counts for anything, I'd love for you to show me something far more intimate...
You can do it, ~target~! The hardest part is taking it all off! It's easy to just be naked once you get that far!
Is this what you usually wear, ~target~? If you were going to go on a dig, you'd need a lot more protection than that.
If ~target~ were going on a dig dressed how he showed up, he'd be in real trouble.
Your clothing seems pretty comfortable, ~target~, but not very practical. You could use a few upgrades.
I don't think what you're wearing is very practical for digging. It needs a lot more... well, a lot.
Such a tease, ~target~. Can't you step it up a bit?
~Target~ is making me feel like I'm not very good at this game, but I can live with that.
Feeling a bit shy still, ~target~? I don't see why you have to be.
Come one, ~target~! I think you need to start pulling a bit more weight around here!
You probably get tired walking and running everywhere. With a good set of wheels and an engine, I can make you some jet shoes to let you zip around faster than a car!
You would definitely need a helmet. That's a must. You'll thank me later when a reaverbot drops on top of you from the ceiling.
First thing is first! You need some armor! Thick, metal, reinforced body armor. Form fitting too! Can't have you getting hurt in a little explosion!
You definitely need something to defend yourself with! How do you feel about grenades?
I do think it's an improvement, even if it's just a small one. I can think of a few more places that still need work though.
I get the feeling you're building up to something big! I guess I'll just have to wait.
Okay, now you just need to keep losing! Come one, it'll be fun! I promise!
I can respect playing smart, but don't keep us waiting in suspense for too long!
I don't know a lot about clothing, but I do know a lot about machines. They're kind of similar, wouldn't you say?
Fashion is not my strong suit. I don't like wearing fancy clothes because I worry too much about getting them dirty. I just get clothes that are durable.
You've got such an interesting sense of style, ~target~. My style has always been focused on practicality, to be honest.
I don't really keep up with fashion at all, but are your clothes more about form or function, ~target~?
There should be a little more than that you can show us? You should be able to see that clearly.
You're not feeling shy, ~target~, are you? Not after I've cleared the way for you.
I've come all this way and ~target~ is still taking her time. I hope you're not getting cold feet, are you?
If you're worried about being immodest, I think we're far past that point now.
If you're looking for something really practical for your wardrobe, how about an arm mounted buster cannon? It fits comfortably over the entire length of your forearm!

In a way, I'm actually something of a clothes designer myself! I make and upgrade all of Mega Man's digger armor parts! People seem to think he's very cool looking, so maybe I do have some skills in fashion!
It's like I always tell Mega Man: you're never fully dressed without your reinforced custom-fit body armor!

So I'm not expert, but I'm sure there's no reason you couldn't upgrade your outfit! How about some spring-loaded armored boots? They'll come in real handy if you fall down an elevator shaft and need to escape!
Well, you need to go at your own pace. I don't have any problem respecting that.
I know it seems tough, but it gets easier as you go along. At least, it did for me. I just focused on having a good time!
I don't want to rush you, It's perfectly fine to take the time you need. The anticipation makes things kind of exciting too.
If you need to just take your time, that's alright with me. Though, I do reserve the right to tease you maybe a tiny bit about it.
